short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free email extraction tool. Download any email address from the web with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find email addresses in seconds. 

Effortlessly Capture Email Addresses for your marketing needs.

Browse the web as normal, and have emails auto-saved.

Key Features:
Save Emails as you browse: We will scan the page you are on and make it easy for you to copy and download any emails we find.

Fast and Lightweight: The extension is compact and designed for speed.


User-Friendly: No intrusive ads or extra junkâ€”just a clean and efficient tool.


Cloaked Email Detection: Identify and extract hidden or cloaked email addresses.


Duplicate Filtering: Automatically removes duplicate email addresses to ensure a unique list.


Local & Offline Support: Extract emails from local HTML documents and text files.


Export Options: Export and download extracted emails to a text or CSV file for convenient use.


Auto Save Emails: When enabled, we store all your extracted email addresses in the cloud for easy access and management.


Subscription Sharing: Share your Premium subscription with friends, family or colleagues.

Pricing:

Paid subscriptions start at only $9.99 per month.

Subscriptions can be shared with friends, family or colleagues.

This extension is a cost-effective alternative to email extraction tools and services like Email Hunter, Voila Norbert, Clearbit Connect and more. 

Usage Note:
If you navigate to a new tab or page, the extracted email addresses will be overwritten. To avoid losing data, switch back to the previous tab to export emails or enable the auto-saving feature (a paid feature). 

The extension only accesses email addresses and stores them locally.

Support:
For any issues, please contact us via hi@tryemailextractor.com. 

Informal Disclaimer:
This extension is intended for personal use only. Please avoid using it for spamming or unsolicited marketing.
